items.title: New North Sea board launched to drive a fair and prosperous transition
items.summary: New board of experts to drive forward the government's plan for a prosperous and sustainable future in the North Sea

items.title: Research: Ambient gamma radiation dose rates across the UK
items.summary: Data received from fixed and mobile monitors measuring the ambient (background) gamma radiation dose rate across the UK.

items.title: ​​Improving the energy efficiency of socially rented homes in England
items.summary: ​​This consultation seeks views on government’s proposal to set a minimum energy efficiency standard (MEES) for socially rented homes for the first time.​

items.title: Notice: Trade remedies notices: countervailing duty on biodiesel products originating from the USA and Canada
items.summary: Trade remedies notices published by the Secretary of State for Business and Trade relating to the countervailing duty on biodiesel originating from the USA including biodiesel products consigned from Canada.

items.title: Notice: Trade remedies notices: anti-dumping duty on biodiesel products originating from the USA and Canada
items.summary: Trade remedies notices published by the Secretary of State for Business and Trade relating to the anti-dumping duty on biodiesel products from the USA, including biodiesel products consigned from Canada.

items.title: Decision: UK-Andean countries committee documents
items.summary: Decisions, documents and meeting minutes from UK-Andean countries committees.

items.title: Notice: Trade remedies notices: anti-dumping duty on wire rod products originating from China
items.summary: Trade remedies notices published by the Secretary of State for Business and Trade relating to the anti-dumping duty on wire rod products originating from China.

items.title: Government saves 300 jobs on the Isle of Wight
items.summary: Government intervention alongside investment from Vestas has saved over 300 jobs at their Isle of Wight factory.

items.title: Guidance: Capture Redress Scheme: independent panel and panel chair privacy notice
items.summary: How the Capture Redress Scheme independent panel and the panel chair  will process your personal data.

items.title: Renewables Obligation (RO) scheme: indexation changes
items.summary: We're seeking views on proposed changes to inflation indexation for the Renewables Obligation (RO) scheme.

items.title: Feed-in Tariffs (FiT) scheme: indexation changes
items.summary: We're seeking views on proposed changes to inflation indexation for the Feed-in Tariffs (FiT) scheme.

items.title: Changes to energy infrastructure planning application fees
items.summary: We are seeking views on proposed changes to fees for energy infrastructure planning applications.

items.title: Policy paper: Interministerial Group for Net Zero, Energy and Climate Change Communiqué: 26 January 2026
items.summary: A summary of the meeting held by the Interministerial Group for Net Zero, Energy and Climate Change.

items.title: Notice: Heat Pump Ready Programme: successful projects
items.summary: Projects awarded under Stream 1, Stream 2 and Stream 3 of the Heat Pump Ready Programme, part of the £1 billion Net Zero Innovation Portfolio.

items.title: Policy paper: Interministerial Group for Trade communiqué: 8 January 2026
items.summary: A note of the meeting held by the Interministerial Group for Trade.

items.title: Oil and gas: environmental submissions and determinations
items.summary: Interested parties can review records of applications and statements submitted to OPRED as required by environmental regulations.

items.title: Guidance: DBT worldwide offices
items.summary: Contact details for Department for Business and Trade (DBT) offices around the world and a list of our HM Trade Commissioners.

items.title: Notice: Trade remedies notices: anti-dumping duty on welded tubes and pipes from Belarus and China
items.summary: Trade remedies notices published by the Secretary of State for Business and Trade relating to the anti-dumping duty on welded tubes and pipes from Belarus and China (formerly Belarus, China, and Russia).

items.title: Regulations: ecodesign of energy-consuming products
items.summary: Guidance for manufacturers, their authorised representatives and importers.

items.title: Accredited official statistics: Weekly road fuel prices
items.summary: Road fuel price statistics providing average UK retail 'pump' prices on a weekly basis.

items.title: Heat network customers to be shielded from unfair price hikes
items.summary: Greater consumer protections introduced for heat network customers across Great Britain for the first time, supporting half a million consumers.

items.title: Guidance: Heat networks optimisation: guidance to help operators improve performance
items.summary: Short guidance notes and videos setting out practical steps to help heat network operators improve performance of heat networks.

items.title: Research: Research into governance models for Smart Data
items.summary: Research into the design of a cross-economy Smart Data governance model.

items.title: Transparency data: DBT: workforce management information December 2025
items.summary: Reports on departmental staff numbers and costs.

items.title: UK lenders step up with £11 billion push to back British businesses
items.summary: UK banks agree £11 billion lending packages to support small business growth, particularly for small and mid-sized enterprises.

items.title: Guidance: Horizon Shortfall Scheme Appeals (HSSA): tariff of reasonable legal costs
items.summary: This guidance sets out the legal costs we will cover for Horizon Shortfall Scheme Appeals (HSSA) applicants.

items.summary: Reports on departmental staff numbers and costs.

items.title: Policy paper: Fuel Poverty Strategy for England
items.summary: This strategy sets out the government’s approach to tackling fuel poverty in England.

items.title: UK and Europe sign historic pact to drive clean energy future
items.summary: Energy Secretary Ed Miliband signs a historic clean energy security pact.

items.title: Scottish co-operatives take centre stage in drive to grow sector
items.summary: Roundtable held at historic New Lanark venue to hear experiences from co-operative and mutuals sector so government can support businesses to grow and thrive

items.title: Independent report: Nuclear Decommissioning Authority: 2026 review
items.summary: The government has commissioned an independent review of the Nuclear Decommissioning Authority (NDA) to assess its performance and identify opportunities for improvement.

items.title: Guidance: Subsidy Control Act 2022: Streamlined Routes
items.summary: Streamlined Routes (also known as Streamlined Subsidy Schemes) are a type of subsidy scheme made by the UK government for use by any UK public authority.

items.title: Notice: Heat Pump Ready Programme
items.summary: The programme supports the development and demonstration of heat pump technologies and tools, and solutions for optimised deployment of heat pumps.

items.title: Extending the ECO4 end date
items.summary: We’re seeking views on extending the end date of the Energy Company Obligation (ECO4) scheme to maintain support for households and the supply chain.

items.title: UK marks first anniversary of 100 Year Partnership in Kyiv with new backing for reform and reconstruction
items.summary: The UK is stepping up its support for Ukraine as both countries mark the first anniversary of the landmark 100 Year Partnership.

items.title: Policy paper: UK Critical Minerals Strategy
items.summary: The government's new strategy sets the UK’s long-term ambition to ensure we have the critical minerals we need to drive economic growth and the clean energy transition.

items.title: Transparency data: UK-Vietnam FTA Joint Forum on Trade and Sustainable Development – meeting minutes, 27 June 2025
items.summary: Minutes of the second Joint Forum on Trade and Sustainable Development under the Free Trade Agreement between Vietnam and the United Kingdom (UKVFTA).

items.title: Decision: UK-Japan CEPA documents
items.summary: Decisions, documents and meeting minutes from the UK-Japan Comprehensive Economic Partnership Agreement (CEPA).

items.title: Starter guide to UK sanctions
items.summary: A guide for businesses and organisations that need to understand more about what sanctions are and how they work.

items.summary: Trade remedies notices published by the Secretary of State for Business and Trade relating to the countervailing duty on rainbow trout from Turkey.
